casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Darrell Wayne MANESS. No. 402A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 28, 2007. Katherine Jane Allen, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Maness. William B. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, Rex Gore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of December 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Maness) shall have up to and including the 26th day *376of January 2008 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 28th day of December 2007."
